meanings.definition: The art or craft of decorating objects with paper cut-outs.
meanings.sent1: She learned decoupage in art class and decorated a box with paper cut-outs.
meanings.sent2: The decoupage on the vase added a unique touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The decoupage artist accidentally glued her fingers together while working on a project.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a decoupage of memories, each piece carefully chosen and placed.
meanings.sent5: The intricate decoupage on the table caught everyone's eye at the craft fair.

meanings.definition: An object decorated using the decoupage technique.
meanings.sent1: The decoupage on the tray made it a beautiful addition to the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: She displayed her decoupage proudly on the shelf for all to see.
meanings.sent3: The decoupage of the old chair made it look brand new.
meanings.sent4: Her decoupage of the jewelry box transformed it into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The decoupage of the photo frame perfectly complemented the picture inside.
